description.en-US: Pontoon Add-on (formerly Pontoon Tools) eases localizers everyday work with Pontoon, the Mozilla localization tool. This add-on brings notifications from Pontoon directly into your browser. It also provides features for proofreading, bug reporting and fixing. The introduction tour will show you around right after installation. Version for Chrome is now available too. Have an idea, for something cool? Let us know on GitHub.

summary.en-US: Tools for Pontoon and its integration into the browser.
